ygData.subject: Re: word of possession
ygData.msgSnippet: Runes are for Wizards...the one you found is for one of the other classes.  I would hang on to it and trade it to someone later on for a rune you need. :))
ygData.messageBody:
Runes are for Wizards...the one you found is for one of the other
classes. I would hang on to it and trade it to someone later on for a rune
you need. :))
